name: Text + Img (Article-focused)
description: A layout that combines an image and text to display a summary of content like a news article, blog post, or promotion. It is used to curate and introduce content, services, or events, encouraging users to view the full details.
examples: Show me this morning's top news.
Tell me about the subscription benefits.

text_heading.description: The headline or title of the article. (Note: Display is typically limited to a maximum of 2 lines).

text_description.description: A summary, excerpt, or brief description of the article's content.
text_description.example: The company entered digital health with new AI tools to support faster diagnostics and better patient care.

background_img.description: The path to the main thumbnail or representative image for the article.

sample.text_description: The company entered digital health with new AI tools to support faster diagnostics and better patient care.

html:
{{ data.text_heading }}

{{ data.text_description }}
